meanings: (책임·빚 등을) shoulder, bear, take on, take over (=떠맡다)
(정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)

examples.korean: She can give as good as she gets. 발음듣기 그녀는 지지 않고 반박할 줄 안다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She’s very widely read in law. 발음듣기 그녀는 법에 대해 아주 폭넓게 안다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She can speak Spanish. 발음듣기 그녀는 스페인어를 할 줄 안다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
